transcript.title: Howard Government to Build the Central Coast Missing Link
transcript.content:
The Australian Government will provide $80.3 million for the construction of a pipeline between the Mardi and Mangrove Creek Dams.

I am pleased to make this announcement with the Minister for Local Government, Territories and Roads and the Federal Member for Robertson, the Hon Jim Lloyd MP and the Federal Member for Dobell, Mr Ken Ticehurst MP, both of whom are committed to deliver this vital water infrastructure for the Central Coast community.

This pipeline will eliminate the 22 kilometre
